snippet: Ms. Damrau will perform at Carnegie Hall, and Ms. DiDonato will star in the Metropolitan Opera’s revival of “La Donna del Lago.”
lead_paragraph: Ms. Damrau will perform at Carnegie Hall, and Ms. DiDonato will star in the Metropolitan Opera’s revival of “La Donna del Lago.”

headline.main: Diana Damrau and Joyce DiDonato, Bel Canto Divas, Return to New York
headline.print_headline: Classical; Dazzling Vocals on Two Stages
